Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Approximately 75 % of the patients were receiving treatment for leukemia or lymphoma .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| leukemia |
| lymphoma |

These are not exact chemical entities, but rather types of diseases. Leukemia is a type of cancer that affects the blood cells, specifically the production of white blood cells in the bone marrow. Lymphoma is a type of cancer that affects the lymphatic system, which is part of the immune system.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| leukemia |
| lymphoma |

These are not exact chemical entities, but rather types of diseases that can involve various chemical processes in the body. Leukemia is a type of cancer that affects the production of blood cells in the bone marrow, and lymphoma is a type of cancer that affects the lymphatic system.
